p: These viral entry blockages include chloroquine, hydroxychloroquine umifenovir, and interferon [ 112]. A cell line study reported that chloroquine significantly decreased the human coronavirus-229E replication at a lower concentration than the clinical dosage [ 113]. A systematic review suggested the rationale, pre-clinical supporting evidence of the effectiveness against SARS-CoV-II, and the clinical safety profiles, that justify future clinical research of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine in patients with COVID-19 [ 114].
